name: Idaten
description:
Submission for Score Space Jam #11

You are a ninja who has taken powers from the Buddist god Idaten. These powers allow you to teleport through your foe's. Complete stages in a race for the highest score. At the end of the stage use your score to purchase upgrades.

Note: using Imbeded game make sure it is fullscreen. not sure why but the character will go off the screen otherwise

Controls:

  • Movement: WASD
  • Look: Mouse
  • Teleport attack: Left Mouse
  • Move around for the camera

Known Issues:

  • Teleporting outside the map resets you to the center
  • First time loading tutorial can freeze the game
  • sometimes the game freezes on play
  • HTML5 not loading

If you want to learn more about the game or contact us check our social media
